Package HTTPClient.http

Provides the URLStreamHandler for the http scheme.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Handler This class implements a URLStreamHandler for http URLs.
 

Package HTTPClient.http Description

Provides the URLStreamHandler for the http scheme. This is not meant to be used directly, but instead is intended for use by java.net.URL. When you set the java system property java.protocol.handler.pkgs to "HTTPClient", java.net.URL will look for and use this stream handler to create and return a URLConnection instance whenever openConnection is invoked on a URL with the "http" scheme.
